title: shippingBoxSetup
description: This schema is used to set up a shipping box so jet can help you choose the appropriate box for a given shipment

box_name.description: the unique name for the given box in your catalog of boxes

ship_from_location.description: Merchant_FCs where box is valid.  Leave blank if box is in use at all shipping locations.  If box is not in use at all Shipping locations enter the shipping locations where box is in use in pipe delimited form.  EX:  West Coast | East Coast

box_length_inches.description: The length of the box in inches

box_width_inches.description: The width of the box in inches

box_height_inches.description: The height of the box in inches

max_weight_pounds.description: The maximum weight limit of the given box in pounds
